title: SJB to support BASL proposals including abolishing Executive Presidency
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) has decided to extend its assistance to proposals brought forward by the Bar Association of Sri Lanka (BASL) which includes the abolishment of the Executive Presidency.

Red alert issued for likely cyclonic storm over Bay of Bengal
